T02D2959:42a-0: @42a * // bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2959:42a-1: don rnams ma lus sgrub byed pa'i //
T02D2959:42a-2: don grub rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi /
T02D2959:42a-3: sgrub pa'i thabs ni bshad par bya //
T02D2959:42a-4: 'byung po ro langs sha bra dang //
T02D2959:42a-5: mkha' 'gro ma dang brjed byed ma //
T02D2959:42a-6: smyo byed srin po la sogs pa'i //
T02D2959:42a-7: mi ma yin gyi sprul pa las //
T02D2959:42a-8: rnam par thar par byed pa yi //
T02D2959:42a-9: gzungs kyi cho ga legs pa ni //
T02D2959:42a-10: rgyud la brten nas bshad par bya //
T02D2959:42a-11: 'dir 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la
T02D2959:42a-12: brten pa'i rang rtags kyi las bdun gyi cho ga
T02D2959:42a-14: rnal 'byor pa dam tshig dang ldan pas sngon du phyag na rdo rje'am /
T02D2959:42a-15: 'di nyid kyi snying po rgyas bsdus la bsnyen pa
T02D2959:42a-16: tshad du phyin pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par
T02D2959:42a-17: 'byung la sogs pas chag chag legs par byas la
T02D2959:42a-18: srog chags med pa'i me tog sngon po'i gcal legs
T02D2959:42a-19: par bkram la rin po che'i mandal gyi steng du
T02D2959:42a-20: / mchod pa lnga dbul par bya'o //
T02D2959:42a-21: de nas rang gi bla ma dang yi dam la
T02D2959:42a-22: sogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D2959:42a-23: mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la /
T02D2959:42a-24: skyabs 'gro sems bskyed dang bdun rnam par dag pa bya'o //
T02D2959:42a-25: de nas bdag nyid stong pa'i nga rgyal du bya ste /
T02D2959:42a-26: srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa dang /
T02D2959:42a-27: bgegs rnams la bka' sgo ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2959:42a-28: h'um zhes mig byin gyis brlab ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2959:42a-29: de nas bsrung ba chen po'i sngags lan bcur brjod la phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2959:42a-30: de'i rjes la bdag dang dngos po thams cad stong par mos par bya /
T02D2959:42a-31: de nas sgrub pa po khrus sngon du song bas /
T02D2959:42a-32: nye reg dang 'thor 'thung la sogs pa byas la tshad med pa bzhi bsgom /
T02D2959:42a-33: de rjes stong pa'i dang las h'um las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2959:42a-34: de'i steng du h'um las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje //
T02D2959:42a-35: de'i lte ba la bhr'um las rin po che'i gzhal
T02D2959:42a-36: yas khang rab tu rgya che zhing kha dog gsal
T02D2959:42a-37: ba rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2959:42a-38: ye shes bzhi 'bar bar byed pa'i sa gzhi dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2959:42a-39: de'i dbus ma dang aa las byung ba'i nyi ma
T02D2959:42b-0: dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de @42b nyid kyi steng
T02D2959:42b-1: du h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje sngon po /
T02D2959:42b-2: nas tsam kha gyes la de nyid 'phros 'dus pa
T02D2959:42b-3: las badzra h'um zhes pas lan bdun brjod pas h'um
T02D2959:42b-4: las byung ba'i stobs po che sku mdog mthing ga
T02D2959:42b-5: zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa dpal rdo rje rnam par
T02D2959:42b-7: tho ba dang zhags pa dang thod pa dang /
T02D2959:42b-8: sdigs mdzub me 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa rnam par bsgom mo //
T02D2959:42b-9: de nas ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang gnyis su med par brtan par bya ba dang /
T02D2959:42b-11: rdo rje rnam par 'joms ba la bstod pa /
T02D2959:42b-12: bdag nyid tha mal pa'i lus su slar langs la /
T02D2959:42b-13: 'dod pa'i don yid la byas te /
T02D2959:42b-14: ye shes kyi 'khor lo las bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun phab ste /
T02D2959:42b-15: bdag nyid lus mgo mjug tu bstims pas las dang
T02D2959:42b-16: nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnam par dag par byas
T02D2959:42b-17: la / de'i rjes la bdag dang gang bsrung ba'i
T02D2959:42b-18: lus dang yan lag thams cad rdo rje mi chod
T02D2959:42b-19: pa'i go cha dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D2959:42b-20: de nas mandal gyi steng du snying po lnga dang
T02D2959:42b-21: ldan pa'i bum pa'i nang du chu gtsang ma srog
T02D2959:42b-23: dri dang 'bru la sogs pa bum pa la shis pa'i rdzas rnams kyis legs par bltams la /
T02D2959:42b-24: kha rgyan dang mgul chings la sogs pa'i bum pa'i
T02D2959:42b-25: rgyan rnams kyis mdzes par byas la rab tu dri
T02D2959:42b-26: zhim pa dang ldan pa'i snying po bris la h'um
T02D2959:42b-28: stobs po cher rnam par blta'o //
T02D2959:42b-29: gzhan gyis longs ma spyad pa'i kham phor kha sbyar
T02D2959:42b-30: yungs kar gyis bkang la bsgrub bya'i ming rus gro
T02D2959:42b-31: ga la bris la gi wang gis dril la gzhag
T02D2959:42b-32: go // de nas bdag nyid kyi srin lag g-yon ba la gzungs thag btags te /
T02D2959:42b-33: kha bshal zhing khrus dang gtsang spra la gnas par byas la /
T02D2959:42b-35: sgrub pa po'i lce'i steng du rdo rje sngon po
T02D2959:42b-36: nas tsam gyi sbubs ma nas sngags kyi rang sgra
T02D2959:42b-37: rdzogs par byas la snang ba rnams kyang rdo rje
T02D2959:42b-38: lta bur gsang sngags kyi rang sgra dang ldan par
T02D2959:42b-39: dmigs la bdag dang stobs po che gnyis su med
T02D2959:42b-40: par byas la / aom sarba bady'i badzra badzra da
T02D2959:42b-41: ra da ra badzra h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a
T02D2959:42b-42: zhes brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags la /
T02D2959:43a-1: gu gul gyi chus bkru zhing nges par blos byas pas /
T02D2959:43a-2: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02D2959:43a-3: sngags kyi rjes la bdag la nad dang dug dang
T02D2959:43a-4: mtshon la sogs pa rnams kyis mi chod par mdzad
T02D2959:43a-5: du gsol zhes gro ga la 'khor lo bris te
T02D2959:43a-6: mgul du yungs kar dang btags na mtshon la sogs
T02D2959:43a-7: pa rnams las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2959:43a-8: sdig pa dag par 'dod na chu gtsang ma la
T02D2959:43a-9: bsngags te ltor btang na bskal ba bdun gyi sdig
T02D2959:43a-10: ba ma lus pa zad par byed do //
T02D2959:43a-11: de ltar 'dir byung ba'i cho ga las lan gsum
T02D2959:43a-12: gsum gyis nyi ma re re la rdzogs par byas
T02D2959:43a-13: nas / sdig pa mi dge ba thams cad las thar bar nges so //
T02D2959:43a-14: de bzhin du sbrul gyis zin ba dang rma dang
T02D2959:43a-15: 'bras la sogs ba la ba ser mo'i 'o mas
T02D2959:43a-16: sbrus pa'i 'jim pa la nyin mtshan gsum du bzlas
T02D2959:43a-17: te phyugs na de nyid las grol bar 'gyur ro
T02D2959:43a-18: // de ltar na rlung dang chu chen po dang
T02D2959:43a-19: ser ba drag po 'bab cing gzhan gyis chod par
T02D2959:43a-20: dka' ba rnams la yungs kar la bsngags nas gtor
T02D2959:43a-21: na gzhan gyis mi chod pa rnams kyang chod par
T02D2959:43a-22: // 'gyur ro // gzhan yang bdag nyid kyi rig
T02D2959:43a-23: sngags kyi las ma grub pa rnams kyang 'di nyid
T02D2959:43a-24: kyi cho ga zhag bdun 'bad na gzhan gyis sbyad
T02D2959:43a-25: par dka' ba'i las 'grub par nges so //
T02D2959:43a-26: spyir gzhan la gnod par byed pa'i gsang sngags dang
T02D2959:43a-27: rig sngags thams cad las gzungs sngags kyi las thams
T02D2959:43a-28: cad la 'di nyid la sngon du rdzogs par byas
T02D2959:43a-29: nas rang gi las la sbyar ba gang yin pa
T02D2959:43a-30: sbyar na 'grub par 'gyur ba la the tshom med
T02D2959:43a-31: par gzhan gyis spyad par dka' ba'i las 'grub par
T02D2959:43a-32: nges so // sgrub pa po'i lus dang ngag dang
T02D2959:43a-33: sems yongs su dag par bya ba ni rab tu
T02D2959:43a-34: nges so // gtso ba'o // mi chod ba zhes
T02D2959:43a-35: bya ba'i rgyud kyi tshig sgrub thabs su phyung ba
T02D2959:43a-36: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa dpal rdo
T02D2959:43a-37: rje rnam par 'joms pa'i las la sbyar ba 'grub
